name: Tan Sri Gopal Sri Ram
bio: Former Federal Court judge serving as Senior Deputy Public Prosecutor (ad-hoc appointment). Lead prosecutor in several 1MDB-related cases. Distinguished jurist with extensive appellate experience.

name: V. Sithambaram
bio: Deputy Public Prosecutor with the Attorney General's Chambers. Member of the prosecution team in multiple high-profile corruption cases.

name: Ahmad Akram Gharib
bio: Deputy Public Prosecutor with the Attorney General's Chambers. Active member of the prosecution team in 1MDB and related corruption cases.
